mapping.title: Launcher Introduction
mapping.description: An introduction to Launcher and starting to use the Mod Tools.

mapping.title: Radiant Introduction
mapping.description: An introduction to Radiant and some of the basic controls and layouts of the program.

mapping.title: Prefabs
mapping.description: Grouping brushes and entities in Radiant - useful for organizing your mapping.

mapping.title: Patch Detailing
mapping.description: Use patches to create more advanced shapes that brushes just can't do.

mapping.title: Pose Manipulator
mapping.description: Move and rotate the joints of models to position them in your map.

mapping.title: Volume Decals
mapping.description: Apply decals to surfaces easily and much faster than using patches.

mapping.title: Adding Effects
mapping.description: Add effects to your map such as fire, fog, steam, spark and more.

mapping.title: Brush Editing
mapping.description: Download more assets for mapping: textures and models.

mapping.title: Gameplay Standards
mapping.description: Sizes and standards to making maps in Call of Duty.

mapping.title: SSI and Lighting
mapping.description: SSI sun volumes and lights such as spot lights and omni.

mapping.title: Mapping References
mapping.description: It's always important to get ideas to inspire your mapping.

mapping.title: Grid Sizes
mapping.description: Lots of new mappers don't use proper grid sizes.

mapping.title: Avoiding Model Spam
mapping.description: Model spam is arguably the worst thing a mapper can do, lets try to avoid that.

mapping.title: Effects Editor Introduction
mapping.description: Creating effects can be quite completex, this tutorial will show you the basics of the effects editor.

zombie.title: Removing Dog Rounds
zombie.description: A quick tutorial on how to remove the Dog rounds from your zombies map.

zombie.title: Doors and Debris
zombie.description: Incorporating doors and debris into your zombies map.

zombie.title: Zones and Zombie Spawners
zombie.description: Setup your zombie spawners and the zones they are designated to.

zombie.title: Download Traversals
zombie.description: Download and use traversal prefabs to have zombies jump up, down, and over objects.

downloads.name: Traversal Prefabs
downloads.description: Prefabs used in this tutorial. They were updated to not require the script part anymore.

zombie.title: Adding Music Easter Eggs
zombie.description: Setup objects in your map to find in order to activate a music easter egg.

downloads.name: Music Easter Egg Files
downloads.description: These are the files used in this tutorial; sound files are not included.

zombie.title: Custom Weapons in Mystery Box
zombie.description: Select which weapons you want in the box as well as putting your custom ones in.

downloads.name: _zm_clientBox.csc
downloads.description: This is the client script used in the tutorial to replace the spinning models in the box.

zombie.title: Custom Wall Weapons and Chalk Drawings
zombie.description: Make your custom weapons wall buys as well as design the calk drawing.

zombie.title: Starting Pistol and Laststand Weapons
zombie.description: Choose what your starting weapon as well as the weapons you use in laststand.

modding.title: Converting AI Animations
modding.description: Convert AI animations from previous Call of Duty titles to a Black Ops 3 format.

downloads.name: AI Conversion
downloads.description: The maya files used in this tutorial to convert older Call of Duty AI animations to Black Ops 3.

modding.title: Extra Assets
modding.description: Download more assets for mapping: textures and models.

modding.title: Setup export2bin.exe
modding.description: A quick tutorial on setting up the export2bin.exe so you can convert .xmodel_export and .xanim_export to .xmodel_bin and .xanim_bin.

modding.title: Installing JBird632s Claymores
modding.description: Download and use my custom Claymores in your zombies maps.

downloads.name: JBirds Claymores
downloads.description: The assets used in this tutorial to install JBirds Claymores.

modding.title: Asset Property Editor Introduction
modding.description: An introduction to APE, a program used for inporting custom assets into Black Ops 3 Mod Tools.

modding.description: Walking through how to import materials.

modding.title: Porting Models
modding.description: Walking through how to import models.

modding.title: Porting Weapons
modding.description: The process of converting older Call of Duty Weapons to Black Ops 3.

downloads.name: Conversion Kit
downloads.description: The conversion kit used in part 1 of this tutorial to convert older Call of Duty weapons to Black Ops 3.

downloads.name: weapons.csv
downloads.description: The sound alias file used as a base in part 3 of this tutorial.

downloads.name: template_mod.csv
downloads.description: The template file used with the sound alias in part 3 of this tutorial.

scripting.title: Setup Sublime
scripting.description: A quick tutorial on setting up Sublime to be able to read and highlight GSC and CSC syntax.

downloads.name: Sublime
downloads.description: Code editing software which is standard for Call of Duty and used in this tutorial.

scripting.description: Setting up a purchase loop so you can purchase something multiple times.
